title: CFP National Championship Preview
description:
Wendi Nix, Tom Luginbill, David Pollack, Harry Lyles Jr, and Dusty Dvoracek will break down the key components that the Alabama Crimson Tide and the Georgia Bulldogs have to follow in order to be crowned the 2022 National Champions.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew breaks down what Alabama and Georgia has to do individually in order to win the 2022 National Championship game.
